product_name: Horny Toad Heartfelt Sweater - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Part jacket, part sweater, the women's Horny Toad Heartfelt Sweater is made of a fuzzy blend of lambswool and angora and features a cozy shawl collar and asymmetrical front. Sweater blend is 70% boiled wool, 20% angora and 10% nylon, creating a dense yet light feel. Draped wrap collar and asymmetric button-down front add eye-catching style. Rolled finish on pockets, cuffs, and hem. Horny Toad Heartfelt Sweater has front patch pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Part jacket, part sweater, the women's Horny Toad Heartfelt Sweater is made of a fuzzy blend of lambswool and angora and features a cozy shawl collar and asymmetrical front.
